physical_appearance: "The image displays an invitation card. There are two sections on the invitatin card, divided in the middle vertically. There are Tamil scripts written in purple ink, in straight horizontal lines from left to right, on the left side of the invitation. Information in English is provided in purple ink as well, on the right side of the invitation. The address, ""No. 20 Klang Road
